Question
========
  
Which null hypothesis belongs to a oneway ANOVA with one factor with g=3 groups?
  
Answerlist
----------
* $H_{0}: \mu_{1}- \mu_{2}- \mu_{3}=0$.
* $H_{0}: \mu_{1}= \mu_{2}= \mu_{3}$.
* $H_{0}: \mu_{i}\neq \mu_{j}$.
* $H_{0}: \mu_{g}= 0$.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
